alert.note: Alert for Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 8:31PM CDT until June 24 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR JONES AND NORTHEASTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wapsipinicon State Park, or over Anamosa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Olin, Center Junction, Central Park and Scotch Grove around 840 PM CDT. Onslow and Hale around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hale, Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, Scotch Grove, Wapsipinicon State Park, Matsell Bridge Natural Area and Central Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities.
